title: key schema
$comment: TODO: support encryption like web3 secret storage. ref. https://github.com/ethereum/wiki/wiki/Web3-Secret-Storage-Definition

privateKey.description: Hexadecimal plain private key. Must keep it in secure

publicKey.description: Public key which pairs with private key. This will not be used in the program and can be ignored.

address.description: Hexadecimal address generated from public key. This will not be used in the program and can be ignored.
